name: Zebulon's Tower
description:
Long ago, the Earth was peaceful and still. Today, there are dragons. 

Colorful snake-like monstrosities are swarming our villages and kingdoms. Wherever they go, they leave a trail of mass destruction. Will we surrender to these beasts or rise to the occasion? 

The dragons have been spotted heading towards Zebulon's Tower. The clock is ticking. Will this be another loss for mankind or a victory against the forces of evil? One thing is for sure: Zebulon must defend his fortress!

*************** Zebulon's Tower ***************

Game Objective: Kill the dragon boss

Controls: Left-mouse button to shoot arrows

(Created in a 12-hour game jam)

Programming :: Jon Fisher

Art :: Sophia Fisher

Testing :: Adrian Fisher
